high_descs: Turn to your right head on the middle of the sink counter
Pick up the soap between other things on the sink counter
Turn to you right and face the right side of the sink
Put the soap on the sink and wash it
Turn around to your left and head to the toilet tank
Put the soap on the left side of the tank
tasks.task_desc: Put the clean soap on the toilet tank

high_descs: Turn around and go to counter by the sink.
Pick up the soap on the counter.
Turn and go to the sink on the right.
Put the soap in the sink and turn on the water.
Turn around and go to the toilet.
Turn around and put the pink soap on the toilet.
tasks.task_desc: Put the washed pink soap on the toilet.

high_descs: Turn to the right and make a quick left to face the counter between the two sinks.
Walk closer to the counter and take the bar of soap.
Turn to the right and walk straight making a left facing the sink.
Put the soap in the sink, turn on the water, turn it off and take the soap back out.
Turn around and walk toward the green bucket and make a right halfway raising up the bar of soap.
Place the bar of soap on the back of the toilet.
tasks.task_desc: Move the bar of soap from the counter to the back of the toilet.

high_descs: Turn right and take one step, then turn left and take one step, then turn right and walk across the room, then turn right to face the sink.
Pick up the pink bar of soap on the edge of the counter.
Turn right and take one step, then turn left and walk across the room, then turn left.
Put the soap in the sink, then turn the sink on for three seconds, then turn off the sink and pick up the bar of soap.
Turn around and walk across the room, then turn right and take one step, then turn right.
Open the cabinet on the right and place the bar of soap next to the toilet paper.
tasks.task_desc: To wash the sink.

high_descs: Turn right, walk to the counter, turn left, then turn right again to face the side of the countertop.
Pick up the bar of soap that is on the bathroom counter.
Turn right, walk a step or two, turn left, walk to the end of the counter, then face the bathroom counter.
Rinse off the soap in the sink.
Move away from the bathroom counter.
Place the bar of soap in the right hand cabinet under the right bathroom sink.
tasks.task_desc: Move a bar of clean soap to a cabinet.

high_descs: Turn right and walk to the left side of the vanity with the sink.
Pick up the bar of soap from the corner of the vanity counter.
Turn right, hang a left at the toilet and walk to the right sink of the vanity.
Put the bar of soap inside the sink, rinse it and pick it back up.
Turn around, walk to the wall and turn around to face the cabinets under the vanity.
Open the lower right cabinet under the vanity, put the bar of soap inside and close the door.
tasks.task_desc: Place a rinsed bar of soap in a cabinet.

high_descs: Turn around and face the side of the cabinet with the sink.
Pick the bar of soap up from the counter.
Go around to the front of the cabinet and stand in front of the sink on the left.
Put the soap in the sink and turn the water on and then turn it off and take the soap back out of the sink.
Go to the left and turn to face the side of the cabinet with the sink in it.
Put the bar of soap in the counter.
tasks.task_desc: Put a clean bar of soap on the counter.

high_descs: turn right, go to left end of sink counter, face blue bottle on counter
pick up pink sponge on counter
go to sink, face sink
place pink sponge in sink, turn on water, pick up pink sponge from sink
turn left, go to left end of counter
place pink sponge on counter to the left of blue bottle
tasks.task_desc: place cleaned pink sponge on counter to the left of blue bottle

high_descs: Move to stand between the shower and vanity, facing the vanity.
Pick up the pink bar of soap from the counter of the vanity.
Carry the soap around the front of the vanity so you're standing in front of the sink.
Place the soap in the sink, turn the water on, and then remove once it has been rinsed.
Carry the soap back around the end of the vanity so you're facing the sink, but your back is to the shower.
Place the soap on the counter to the left of the bottle of lotion.
tasks.task_desc: Rinse a bar of soap.

high_descs: Turn to the right and walk to the wall then look down.
Pick up the empty toilet paper roll from the green trash bin.
Turn around and take one step, then turn right to face the cabinets.
Open the cabinet on the left and place the empty toilet paper roll in the front right side of the cabinet.
Look up at the counter.
Pick up the empty toilet paper roll from the counter.
Turn around and take one step, then turn back around to look at the cabinets.
Open the cabinet on the left and place the empty toilet paper roll in the front of the cabinet.
tasks.task_desc: Put the toilet paper rolls away.

high_descs: walk over to the sink on the right
pick up the box of tissues
walk the box of tissues over to the toilet
place the box of tissues on top of the toilet tank
tasks.task_desc: get the tissues from the sink and put them on the toilet tank.

high_descs: turn around walk until you reach the sink
pick up box of tissue in the corner of the counter top to the right
turn around walk until you reach the door, turn right walk until you reach the toilet
place tissue box on top of the toilet next to the vase
tasks.task_desc: put tissue box on the toilet

high_descs: Turn around and walk across the room to the sink.
Pick up the box of tissues on the counter, in the back right corner, behind the soap dispenser.
Turn around and go to the toilet.
Put the box of tissues on the tank of the toilet, between the soap dispenser and the wash cloth.
tasks.task_desc: Put a box of tissue on the toilet tank.

high_descs: Go to the sinktop
Pick up a toilet roll
Go to the sink cabinet
Put the roll in the cabinet
Go to the right of the sink
Pick up a roll of toilet paper
Go to the sink cabinet
Put the roll in the cabinet
tasks.task_desc: Put an empty roll and a full roll of toilet paper in a sink cabinet

high_descs: Turn around, proceed to counter across room.
Pick up candle from above pink soap and left of tissue box on counter.
Move to right to face right side sink.
Open far right cabinet under sink, put candle in cabinet in front of tissue box and left of spray bottle.  Close cabinet door.
Look up to counter to right of sink.
Pick up toilet paper from counter, right of sink with pink soap in it.
Look down to below sink.
Open far right cabinet, put toilet paper in cabinet between candle and spray bottle.  Close cabinet door.
tasks.task_desc: Move candle and toilet paper to cabinet under sink.

high_descs: turn right, turn right, take a few steps, turn left to face toilet
take the empty toilet paper roll off the back of the toilet
take two steps to the right
put empty toilet paper roll on the toilet paper holder
tasks.task_desc: move empty toilet paper roll from back of toilet to holder

high_descs: Turn around and go towards the shower, then turn left to stand in front of the toilet.
Pick up the tube off the top shelf of the toilet.
Turn around, step forward, turn left, step forward, then turn left to face the toilet paper holder.
Place the tube into the toilet paper holder to the right of the toilet.
tasks.task_desc: Pick up a toilet paper tube and place it into the holder.

high_descs: Turn around and face the toilet.
Pick up the empty roll from the back of the toilet.
Move to the right and face the toilet paper holder on the wall to the right of the toilet.
Put the empty roll on the toilet paper holder.
tasks.task_desc: Put an empty roll on a toilet paper holder.

high_descs: Walk to the counter in front of you then turn right and walk to the toilet then turn left and walk to the center of the counter to you left and turn left.
Pick up the tissues that are to the left of another box of tissues.
Turn around and walk to the door then turn right.
Put the tissues on the back of the toilet.
tasks.task_desc: Put a box of tissues on the toilet.

high_descs: Turn to the left, go straight, then to the left again to face the counter top between the two sinks.
Pick up the tissue box to the left.
Turn to the left and head straight to face the glass shower door.
Place the tissue box on the top of the toilet to the left of the glass shower door.
tasks.task_desc: Place the box in between the 2 sinks on top of the toilet.

high_descs: go around the sink so you are facing it between both bowls
pick up the tissue box on the left side
take the tissue box to the toilet
place the tissue box on the toilet tank on its end
tasks.task_desc: take a tissue box to the toilet and put it on the tank

high_descs: Turn left and look at the toilet.
Pick up the plunger on the floor to the right of the toilet.
Turn around and face the sink.
Open the bottom right cabinet door, place the plunger inside, and close the door.
tasks.task_desc: Place the toilet plunger beneath the sink.

high_descs: Turn around and face the toilet.
Pick up the plunger to the right of the toilet.
Turn around to face the sink behind you.
Put the plunger in the right cabinet beneath the sink, behind the bottle.
tasks.task_desc: Put a plunger under the sink.

high_descs: Move to the toilet.
Pick up the plunger from the floor.
Bring the plunger to the sink.
Put the plunger in the cabinet under the sink.
tasks.task_desc: Put the plunger in the cabinet under the sink.

high_descs: Turn around and walk towards the wall, then turn left and walk up to the counter.
Pick up the bottle of lotion off of the counter.
Turn around and walk forward, the hang a right and walk over to the toilet.
Put the bottle of lotion on to of the toilet tank.
tasks.task_desc: Move a bottle of lotion to the toilet tank.

high_descs: Turn around and walk to the corner then turn left and walk to the sink.
Pick up the soap dispenser from the counter.
Turn around and walk to the corner, then turn right and walk to the side of the toilet.
Put the soap dispenser on top of the toilet next to the rag.
tasks.task_desc: Put a soap dispenser on top of the toilet.

high_descs: Turn around, move to the right sink on the left.
Pick up the soap bottle on the counter, right of the sink.
Turn around, bring the soap bottle to the toilet.
Put the soap bottle on the toilet tank lid.
tasks.task_desc: Put a soap bottle on the toilet tank lid.

high_descs: Head to the wall then turn left and go to the sink
Get the bar of soap from the cupboard on the right under the sink
Get closer to the sink
Put the bar of soap in the sink and turn on the water, then turn off the water and pick up the soap
Turn around and go to the wall, then turn back around facing the sink
Put the soap in the cupboard on the right under the sink

high_descs: Walk across the room then turn left.
Open the cabinet on the right below the sink and take out the pink bar of soap.
Look up at the sink.
Put the bar of soap in the sink, then turn the water on for three seconds, then turn the water off and pick up the bar of soap.
Turn around and take one step, then turn around to face the sink.
Open the cabinet below the sink on the right and put the soap inside the cabinet.
tasks.task_desc: To wash the sink.

high_descs: Walk ahead to the wall, then turn left to the right sink.
Take the soap out of the bottom right cabinet.
Look up at the sink.
Wash the soap in the sink.
Look down at the cabinets.
Place the soap in the right bottom cabinet in front of the blue bottle.
tasks.task_desc: Place a rinsed bar of soap in a cabinet.

pick the spray bottle from the sink

put the spray bottle on top of the water tank

pick up the spray bottle from the sink
turn around to the left go right and forward towards the toilet

Pick up the box of tissues.
Turn around and walk to the door then turn right and walk to the toilet.
Stand the box of tissues on end on the back of the toilet.

high_descs: Hang a left to reach the sinks.
Pick up the bottle of lotion from the right side of the right sink.
Turn around to walk to the trash can.
Set the bottle of lotion in the trash can.

pick up the soap bottle on the counter
turn around and walk straight then turn left towards the garbage can
put the soap bottle inside the garbage can

pick up pumper bottle from near sink
turn around to face green bin
put bottle in green bin

Pick up the cardboard toilet paper tube off of the counter.

Pick up the empty toilet paper roll on the left of the sink
Turn left and go to the right side of the toilet.
Put the empty toilet paper roll on the holder.

pick up empty toilet paper roll in between sink and candle
turn around, go to toilet to the right
place on toilet paper holder to the right of toilet

Pick up the green plunger between the toilet brush and the wall from the floor.
Turn to the left, move forward toward the green rubbish bin, turn to the right and move toward the door, then turn around and face the left end of the vanity.
Open the vanity door underneath the sink and place the plunger in front of the box of tissues and to the left of the cardboard toilet paper roll.

Grab the plunger on the floor
Turn left, walk to the cabinet under the sink
Open the cabinet on the left, put the plunger in, close the cabinet

high_descs: Move to the toilet.
Pick up the plunger on the floor.
Move to the cabinet under the sink.
Put the plunger in the cabinet under the sink.

high_descs: Walk forward, then turn right and walk up to the counter.
Pick up the bottle of lotion that is to the right of the sink.
Walk over to the toilet behind you.
Put the bottle of lotion on top of the toilet tank.

Pick up the soap bottle with the red lid on the right side of the left sink.

high_descs: Walk over to the sink.
Grab the bottle.
Walk over to the toilet.
Place the bottle on the toilet.

high_descs: Turn right and face the back of the toilet.
Pick up the tube from the back of the toilet.
Turn around and face the cabinet below the sink.
Open the cabinet door on the right side below the sink, place the tube inside the cabinet, close the door.
Turn around and walk to the toilet.
Pick up the toilet paper on the toilet paper dispenser to the right of the toilet.

Open the door to the cabinet on the right, place the toilet paper in the cabinet to the right of the tube, close the door.

Take the empty toilet paper roll off the back of the toilet.

Put the empty toilet paper roll in the right cabinet under the left sink.

Take the toilet paper roll off the holder.

Put the roll of toilet paper in the right cabinet under the left sink.

high_descs: walk to face the toilet
pick up the toilet roll from the toilet tank
turn around to face the cabinets under the sink
open the right cabinet door, put the toilet roll inside, close the cabinet door
turn around to face the toilet
pick up the toilet paper from the toilet paper hanger
turn around to face the cabinets under the sink
open the right cabinet door, put the toilet paper inside to the right of the toilet roll, close the cabinet door

high_descs: Step to the right to face the cabinet below the right side of the sink.
Pick up the bar of soap under the right side of the sink.
Step to the left to face the left side of the sink.
Wash the bar of soap in the sink and remove it.
Walk around the left side of the sink to face the side of the left sink.
Place the bar of soap on the back of the sink on the left edge.

high_descs: Turn right and walk to the wall, then turn left and walk up to the counter.
Open the rightmost cabinet door below the counter and take out the bar of soap, then close the door.
Turn left and walk towards the shower, then turn right to face the sink.
Put the bar of soap in the leftmost sink and turn the water on, after a couple seconds turn off the water and remove the now clean bar of soap.
Turn left and walk over to the shower, then turn right and walk up to the wall, turn right to face the counter.
Put the clean bar of soap on the counter to the left of the white spray bottle.
tasks.task_desc: Put a clean bar of soap on the counter.

high_descs: Turn to the right and go to the sink next to the wall
Open the cabinet door on the right next to the wall and get the pink soap
Turn to the left and go to the sink closest to shower.
Place the soap in the sink in front of you and turn the water on.
Pick up the soap in the sink.
Turn to the left and go to the wall between counter and shower and place the soap behind the spray bottle.
tasks.task_desc: Place the wet soap on the counter by the spray bottle.

high_descs: Walk ahead to the sink, then walk left around the counter to the left side.
Pick up the bottle of soap on the counter.
Walk right and then veer left to the green bin in the corner of the room.
Place the soap bottle in the bin.
tasks.task_desc: Place a soap bottle in a trash bin.

high_descs: Walk up to the counter, then turn left and walk over to the left end of the counter.
Pick up the closest bottle of lotion off of the counter.

Put the bottle of lotion in the small green bin.

high_descs: Go to the left and then turn right and right again to face the end of the counter.

Turn to the right and cross the room to the left to stand in front of the trash can.
Put the bottle in the trash can.

high_descs: Turn around and face the sink.
Open the cabinet under the sink on the right and pick up the spray bottle.
Go to the left sink of the counter.
Put the spray bottle on the left edge of the counter.

high_descs: Move to the sink behind you
pick up a bottle from within the counter
move to the left side of the counter ahead of you
put the bottle on the counter

Open the cabinet on the right side and pick up the spray bottle
Turn to your left and head to the left side end of the sink counter
Put the spray bottle on the counter

Pick up the candle from the counter
Turn around walk straight then turn back around and face the front of the counter
Open the bottom right door and place the candle inside, then close the door

Pick up the candle from the counter
Turn around walk straight then turn back around and face the front of the counter
Open the bottom right door and place the candle inside, then close the door

Wet the soap in the sink with water.
Bring the soap back to the toilet behind you.
Put the soap on the toilet.

Open right side cupboard, place soap in open cupboard, close cupboard
